Bitex API Guides

Don't Panic: The Bitex.la API user guides and tutorials

Quotas, Rate Limiting, DDOS protection

Please limit your usage to 5 requests a second, running over that limit may result in a 429 HTTP response status.

Our DDOS mitigation service is Cloudflare.com.

In some cases, cloudflare may block you or challenge you if you’re accessing from a blacklisted IP or if your usage pattern seems malicious.

If you’re being mistakenly filtered please contact us at developers@bitex.la so we can evaluate your case and whitelist your IP.
